s4023: Year 8: Sent Xi Ke as envoy to Qi; women laughed at him; Ke was angry and returned.
s4038: Year 8: Jin attacked and defeated us.
s4071: Year 11: Together with Lu and Cao defeated Qi.
s4095: Year 17: Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
s4103: Year 13: Lu duke came; was not respectful.
s4161: Year 2: Minister Wu came to plot attacking Chu.
s4185: Year 9: Saved Zheng. Winter, made alliance with Jin.
s4197: Year 10: Duke went to Jin for funeral; avoided mentioning it.
s4207: Year 4: Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
s4245: Year 13: Assembled Jin to attack Qin.
s4248: Year 26: Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
s4250: Year 11: Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4254: Year 17: Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4255: Year 7: Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4281: Year 15: Xu feared Zheng and requested to move to Ye.
s4282: Year 13: Hua Yuan fled to Jin and returned.
s4286: Year 2: Jin seized our duke and returned.
s4289: Year 10: Together with Lu assembled at Zhong Li.
s4295: Year 6: Defeated Chu at Yan Ling.
s4329: Year 18: For Yu Shi attacked Song Peng Cheng.
s4330: Year 3: Chu attacked Peng Cheng; enfeoffed Yu Shi.
s4335: Year 12: Together with Chu attacked Song.
s4351: Year 13: Jin attacked and defeated us; army at Yi Shang; Chu came to save.
s4357: Year 2: Assembled Jin to build Hu Lao.
s4375: Year 3: Wei Jiang insulted Yang Gan.
s4396: Year 30: Chu attacked us. Cheng Gong died.
